value:
$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Which way do we go? Where's the
exit? This way?$k$pWhat do we do? If we don't hurry...
Surtr will catch up with us! And
then—$k$pNo! We can't let that happen! I'm too
young to die! I've never even had a
chance to fall in love...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You really do not ever shut up.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|OK! I'm sorry!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|This way. Quickly!$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You're Surtr's daughter, Laevatein...
Aren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Daughter? No. To him, I am just a
tool.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|So you've come to capture us.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Yes. And to find our foes. They will
come here. It is the only way to
defeat Father.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I take it that Laegjarn has already
fallen.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Insult my sister and I will cut you
down.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I invite you to. Destroy the sacrifice
that your father needs to survive! I'd
rather die than be used by Surtr.$k$pAnd my brother need not risk his life
rescuing me...$k$p$EFace_Anger|If you think you can kill me, you
should probably give it a try.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You...$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo200,255,255,255,255|$Fi200|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Enough!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Bruno? You're here!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Stay out of my way.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Ylgr! Are you here?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Fjorm! Here I am!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Given the situation...I think we can
help you out, Princess Veronica. Just
this once!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Askr...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Askrans! Where is my sister?$k$pDid you kill her?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We—$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I cannot forgive this...$k$pAs my father ordered, I—$k$pI will kill you. Not for Father. But
because of what you have done.
Every last one!$k$p$Sbs1000|
$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hahh...hahh...$k$pI can...still fight. Flames...of Múspell!$k$p

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Múspell, dragon of flame...I offer you
my flesh.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Stop!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Arm and arm, leg and leg. My head,
my heart... All of it is offered, that you
may feed. Devour me...$k$p$Sbs2000|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Please, stop! This isn't what Laegjarn
wanted!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|What? How do you—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|In her last moments, Princess
Laegjarn's only wish was that you
should live.$k$pDon't throw away your life here! You
must honor your sister's wish and
live on.$k$pOne day, Nifl and Múspell will cease
hostilities. There will be peace
between our realms!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|She ordered me...to live?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Order? No, Laevatein. She cared
about you. It was her dying wish that
you be saved...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Laegjarn...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica. To have kept you waiting
so long...I apologize.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|That doesn't matter, Bruno. Do you
have word from Xander?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|He is safe as well. You can stop your
worrying.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Zacharias... Thank you. You have
saved us yet again.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|It is I who must thank you, Alfonse.
You saved me long ago.$k$pThat moment...it has been in my mind
of late.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Zacharias... We can talk later.$k$p$EFace|Keep your sister and Ylgr safe. We
will face Surtr.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Without his sacrifices, the Rite of
Flame cannot protect him.$k$p$EFace_Anger|It is time to put an end to this.$k$p$Sbs150|
